summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates Django admin configuration checks, ensuring each admin option (e.g., date hierarchy, fields, fieldsets, filters, foreign key naming, forms, inlines, list display, pagination, ordering, prepopulated fields, radio fields, raw ID fields, save options, and search fields) correctly raises errors for invalid settings and accepts proper configurations.
business_intent: To verify and enforce the correctness of admin option validation logic, preventing misconfigurations in Django admin interfaces and improving code reliability.
